A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Almost 3 hour film that still contained multiple plot holes. For their budget and talented actors\, I expected a lot more. one thing I was left with after the first film was multiple exciting questions about new characters and a developing story. However\, rather than do a explanatory film that eagerly left the audience waiting for the third film we got a bunch of cgi space fights\, a pointless gambling planet and no backstory on the characters that needed it most.
